tachyon.client.file

Class FileOutStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • tachyon.client.OutStreamBase
        • tachyon.client.file.FileOutStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, Cancelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DummyFileOutputStream, LineageFileOutStream

    @PublicApi
public class FileOutStream
extends OutStreamBase
    Provides a streaming API to write a file. This class wraps the BlockOutStreams for each of the blocks in the file and abstracts the switching between streams. The backing streams can write to Tachyon space in the local machine or remote machines. If the UnderStorageType is UnderStorageType.SYNC_PERSIST, another stream will write the data to the under storage system.
